report.title: Sample status summary
report.query: SELECT #columns# from cache_samples_functional s join cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=s.id left join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.sample_id=s.id and o.survey_id=512 where s.survey_id=512;

param.name: sample_id
param.description: ID of the sample to show species for

column.name: dna_analysis_done
column.sql: o.id is not null and o.taxon_group_id<>43

column.name: proposed_status
column.sql: case when snf.attrs_json->>'1214' is null and o.id is null and snf.attrs_json->>'1161' in ('Sample received', 'Pack requested') then snf.attrs_json->>'1161' when snf.attrs_json->>'1214' is not null and o.id is null then 'Sugar results added' when snf.attrs_json->>'1214' is not null and o.id is not null then 'Species results added' else null end
